mapper.insert: insert into AuctionProducts (pName, category, constructor, brandName, cost, userId) values (#{pName}, #{category}, #{constructor}, #{brandName}, #{cost}, #{userId});
mapper.select: select * from AuctionProducts WHERE pName LIKE #{pName} AND userId = #{userId}
select * from AuctionProducts WHERE pName = #{pName} AND userId = #{userId} AND productId = #{productId}
mapper.insert: insert into Auction (auctionName, auctioneer, passbid, productId, auctionStart, auctionEnd, bidder, nowBid) VALUES (#{auctionName},#{auctioneer},#{passBid},#{productId},#{auctionStart},#{auctionEnd}, #{bidder}, #{nowBid})
mapper.select: select * from auction a JOIN auctionProducts p ON a.productid = p.productid WHERE p.userid = #{userid}
select * from auction a JOIN auctionProducts p ON a.productid = p.productid WHERE aid = #{aid}
mapper.update: update auction set productid = #{productId}, nowbid = #{nowBid},passbid = #{passBid},auctionName = #{auctionName},auctionStart = #{auctionStart}, auctionEnd = #{auctionEnd}, status = #{status} WHERE aid = #{aid}
